DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical study observe safety efficacy multi-vector LV lead Chinese patient indicate Cardiac Resynchronization Therapy ( CRT ) . This multi-center , non-randomized observational study . The total duration study expect 2.5 year . The clinical study conduct 15 center China . Approximately 120 subject enrol study . Subjects follow 3 , 6 , 12months every 6 month afterwards . All subject need follow least 6 month .
